name: Cure Universe
overview:
Cure Universe is a specialized social networking platform. It provides you an opportunity to discover and connect relevant Doctors, health professionals, patients, caregivers, and medical researchers from all over the world.

www.cureuniverse.com

Description

Cureuniverse.com is a very unique and specialized social networking platform where doctors, health professionals, patients, caregivers, medical researchers and students can openly interact, participate in discussions and share their health experiences, stories, thoughts, and advice. It is a place where patients can go to share their health, wellness and fitness related experiences with others and also search for other patients who have had similar experiences. It provides you an opportunity to discover and connect relevant Doctors, health professionals, patients, caregivers, and medical researchers from all over the world.
